title: Sylentnite Flantium Ore
content: Sylentnite Flantium Ore is a type of ore used in the Blacksmith profession. It is obtained from a Sylentnite Flantium Ore (skill node) using the Miner profession at level 12, or purchased from Bobble's Oresome Ores. It can be used on a Goblin Smelter to receive a Sylentnite Flantium Ingot.
